### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#a4689c1a05c58cd8e0dbb57bc84fdc8cf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator ARCFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00466">466</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitEpilogue() {#aac8f5d5c66c21056b3144508e8142639}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ARCFrameLowering::emitEpilogue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Insert Epilogue into the function.

Insert epilog code into the function.

For ARC, this inserts a call to a function that restores callee saved registers onto the stack, when enough callee saved registers are required.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00238">238</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitPrologue() {#aa1bd5939c1fd11c05038c583ada0110d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ARCFrameLowering::emitPrologue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Insert Prologue into the function.

Insert prolog code into the function.

For ARC, this inserts a call to a function that puts required callee saved registers onto the stack, when enough callee saved registers are required.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized() {#a230b654eb7319d9e7a6d9d62afa2d5f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ARCFrameLowering::processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized - This method is called immediately before the specified function&#39;s frame layout (MF.getFrameInfo()) is finalized.

Once the frame is finalized, MO&#95;FrameIndex operands are replaced with direct constants. This method is optional.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00432">432</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### restoreCalleeSavedRegisters() {#a058c2c2f387b28b806bb94abc34aaab7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARCFrameLowering::restoreCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
restoreCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to restore all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of load instructions via loadRegToStackSlot().

If it returns true, and any of the registers in CSI is not restored, it sets the corresponding Restored flag in CSI to false. Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00417">417</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spillCalleeSavedRegisters() {#ae76f197bf80407fa11be07ed0a2c682d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARCFrameLowering::spillCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
spillCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to spill all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of store instructions via storeRegToStackSlot().

Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-h">ARCFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp/#l00400">400</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcframelowering-cpp">ARCFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
